O_NAMA_HEADER: Everything you need to know about us and our history!
O_NAMA_02: We have been pleasing customers since day one
O_NAMA_03: A quality and relaxing restaurant, run by award winning owners, all across balkan countries, with elegant modern touches. Relax by the cozy log burner perfect for winter evenings or enjoy outdoor seating on a sunny days. A daily menu, all freshly prepared in our clean kitchen, includes burgers, pies, steaks, fish and many more for reasonable price. Convenient locations, fast delivery, fresh food and cozy atmosphere will guarantee great meal for all occassions.
O_NAMA_05: Our restaurants are opened 24/7, free delievery in every part of town all day. We openly recieve all ideas and complaints via our e-mail.
O_NAMA_07: We serve fresh and natural based food. Our chefs deliever best products for best customers.
O_NAMA_10: We opened our first restaurant on February 2. Our first restaurant was located in Split, Croatia. There were 4 employees at that time, their names were Filip Bikić, Marin Tomić, Branko Radić and Karlo Rešetar.
O_NAMA_12: Two years after the opening of first restaurant in Split, Croatia, we expanded our buisness to Zagreb. That was the year of the famous „Triple take“ burger which pleased all of our customers with special and unique taste. That was the year we became a brand.
O_NAMA_14: June 7 we opened our first restaurant outside of Croatia. We decided to settle in Bulgaria, Sofia. That day the history was written and many bellies were full. Our brand became to expand across whole Balkan with our new drive-in system and 24/7 delivery service.
O_NAMA_16: Today we own more than 5 restaurants across 3 balkan countries and we are well known and worldly acceptable brand. We have vast variety of products and unique system of delivery and serving food for our customers.
